texts.biography: In a tribe of Pygmies or you inherit the leadership or you take. Teutates knew what to do. 'Leader' and 'fighter' in the language of the Pygmies is the same word.
texts.name: Teutates

specialty.description:
{Pygmy}
Increases Speed of any Pygmy by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 1 level.
specialty.name: Pygmy
specialty.tooltip: Increases Speed of any Pygmy by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 1 level.
